title: ChicksX
author: ChicksX
created_time: March 03, 2023, 03:08:55 PMLast edit: September 04, 2024, 03:48:04 PM by ChicksX

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: In fact, I had not heard of this platform before, and I was surprised that it has been working for a long time, and there are no complaints about it.I do not know if you belong to the platform team or you were paid for publishing this ad, but I will give you two notes that may be useful to the platform :- First, it would be better to design an official announcement thread for the platform here on the forum containing identifying details and to be an official channel that the community can use to publish their opinions and discussions regarding the platform and the services it provides, in addition to using it to publish important updates and announcements. You can purchase a Cooper membership to be able to post photos and some other privileges that your current membership does not allow. At least, you can assign a manager to do this for some money.- Secondly, I browsed the interface of the platform without registering an account, and it caught my attention that there is no indication of the fees that go to the platform for all services. Do I have to register an account and verify it to be able to know the fees?

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on March 03, 2023, 08:46:42 PMIn fact, I had not heard of this platform before, and I was surprised that it has been working for a long time, and there are no complaints about it.the truth is the domain is very old, it stretches all the way from 2004 or even beyond according to wayback machine. It has mostly been used for porn websites all those years prior to these guys acquiring it  So if my calculations are right, the exchange is still probably less than a year old so far, thus the little online presence about it

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on March 03, 2023, 09:15:23 PMthe truth is the domain is very old, it stretches all the way from 2004 or even beyond according to wayback machine. It has mostly been used for porn websites all those years prior to these guys acquiring it  So if my calculations are right, the exchange is still probably less than a year old so far, thus the little online presence about itBase on the who.is the info I came to know the domain has been registered in 2018. If it was registered on 2004 then it might be from any other person who left the domain and then OP bought it.@Op I have tried to check your site and I have faced an issue. When I select the USA dollar it automatically takes me to the Canadian dollar. If the interface can't work for the US dollar then how it is global and what is the use of the US dollar?

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on March 03, 2023, 09:15:23 PMQuote from: coupable on March 03, 2023, 08:46:42 PMIn fact, I had not heard of this platform before, and I was surprised that it has been working for a long time, and there are no complaints about it.the truth is the domain is very old, it stretches all the way from 2004 or even beyond according to wayback machine. It has mostly been used for porn websites all those years prior to these guys acquiring it  So if my calculations are right, the exchange is still probably less than a year old so far, thus the little online presence about itI think your estimates are correct. I put the words "chicksx porn" in the search engine, and I actually saw some results indicating the use of the concept of chicksx in this field without knowing what exactly it is. Check here.Also, the reviews of the trading platform site on Pilot-trust date back to May 2022, which actually means that the platform was not active more than a year ago. Of course, all reviews are positive. This is a little suspicious, but overall there are no criticisms of it on the rest of the review sites.https://www.trustpilot.com/review/chicksx.com

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on March 03, 2023, 08:46:42 PMIn fact, I had not heard of this platform before, and I was surprised that it has been working for a long time, and there are no complaints about it.I do not know if you belong to the platform team or you were paid for publishing this ad, but I will give you two notes that may be useful to the platform :- First, it would be better to design an official announcement thread for the platform here on the forum containing identifying details and to be an official channel that the community can use to publish their opinions and discussions regarding the platform and the services it provides, in addition to using it to publish important updates and announcements. You can purchase a Cooper membership to be able to post photos and some other privileges that your current membership does not allow. At least, you can assign a manager to do this for some money.- Secondly, I browsed the interface of the platform without registering an account, and it caught my attention that there is no indication of the fees that go to the platform for all services. Do I have to register an account and verify it to be able to know the fees?Hey there! Thanks a lot for the comments on this thread and the recommendations. I'm part of the advertising team and staff as well.Yeah! I was looking at how to add images because when I created the post, it wasn't letting me. We have a banner with all the information, but I'll look into the membership so we can do that. Appreciate the information! For the fees, we currently have them shown in the first step of the order after you hit exchange now, but yes, you'd have to have an account created to be able to see it

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.created_time: March 05, 2023, 08:10:45 AMLast edit: March 05, 2023, 08:28:42 AM by LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: ChicksX on March 04, 2023, 03:19:37 PMI was looking at how to add images because when I created the post, it wasn't letting me.See: Newbies can now pay a small fee to enable images.Quote from: ChicksX on March 03, 2023, 03:08:55 PMwithout limits or borders.Tor browser gives me a white screen. You may want to get that working for privacy conscious users.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: The domain name isn't suitable for a crypto exchange. I haven't visited the site, but it looks like an instant exchange judging by the screenshot that shasan posted. If that's true, what is the benefit of using your service instead of some older competitors like Changelly, ChangeNOW, FixedFloat, or any of the other ones? Or an aggregator like BestChange to find the best deals, for example?Can you give us some pros and cons?

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Sorry that I haven't replied to the other comments yet!Yes! My team acquired the domain last year, and the name is because we also have another website for gaming that is more known, which is Chicks Gold, and we have now expanded to cryptocurrency. But it doesn't mean anything bad hahah. Our mascot is a yellow chicken ---Hey! Regarding the issue. The tool selects CAD because of the payment method. Interac only accepts that currency, but we have recently added cash by mail to the website, which allows other types of currency.We also have other payment methods, but we're adding them to the website step by step.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: I've tried using the site and have a few notes:The site works slowly, I do not even use Tor, I just browse normally from Microsoft, and yet the site loads slowly.There are no maximum limits, I tried a transaction with more than 10 bitcoins and it worked for me without any problems. It is difficult to find a transfer by normal methods for an amount of more than 200,000 dollars without verifying identity.Payment methods require more than one day.Is there any legal information about you?

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Quote from: Husires on March 05, 2023, 09:44:12 PMI've tried using the site and have a few notes:The site works slowly, I do not even use Tor, I just browse normally from Microsoft, and yet the site loads slowly.There are no maximum limits, I tried a transaction with more than 10 bitcoins and it worked for me without any problems. It is difficult to find a transfer by normal methods for an amount of more than 200,000 dollars without verifying identity.Payment methods require more than one day.Is there any legal information about you?Hey there! Thanks a lot for checking the site. We'll take your notes as recommendations to improve the user experience. Regarding the last question, we have worked on legalizing the brand where we're based at. However, which information would you like us to provide?Regards,

comments.author: Renampun
comments.body: I am quite surprised by the 5 star rating from users (trustpilot) for this site, I like to try new exchanges but the KYC obligation is sometimes an obstacle for me because I don't carelessly give it while this site requires users to do KYC,QuoteTo access any Services, you must complete KYC requirements by following the identity verification process specified in the AML Policy. Failure to complete the KYC process as per the AML/KYC Policy will entitle the Company to terminate the said User Account immediately. ChicksX uses a third party verification service "Veriff" to provide ID and customer verification services. By using the service, you agree to provide the information requested to Veriff to use in anyway necessary to conduct a review and determine, authenticate, and verify your identity and share that with ChicksX. ChicksX uses the verification as a means to determine your identity and match it with your payment option of choice.source---just a suggestion, to attract more users it's a good idea for you to provide a referral feature and it's quite successful in attracting more users.best regards-

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: ChicksX on March 03, 2023, 03:08:55 PMOur cryptocurrency exchange platform allows our customers to buy and sell digital currencies globally. We offer 24/7 live service so that you may send, receive, or exchange without limits or borders. Our team of specialists is ready to happily assist you every step of the way to a safe and secure transfer, whenever, wherever.Check us out! https://chicksx.com/ You have to do better than this because your competitor will eat you up in terms of marketing you'll need to post features and strong points through images and for you to do that you need a copper account, copper accounts are good for those newbies who promote platforms and projects because your newbie account is limited to text only and because of these people will just skip your platform for a better platform here with professional and well-designed introduction.

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Hey there! Thank you all for your recommendations. We're working on it

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: Renampun on March 24, 2023, 04:26:58 AMI am quite surprised by the 5 star rating from users (trustpilot) for this site A service that has 23 ratings and all of them 5 stars smells of feedback manipulation and maybe paid reviews. I wouldn't consider that as a plus when determining if this is an exchange I would trust. In fact, those reviews make me not trust it. Many of the reviewers only have that one posted review for ChicksX and no other activity on TrustPilot. Don't trust the reviews you read online.

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on April 02, 2023, 07:40:13 AMQuote from: Renampun on March 24, 2023, 04:26:58 AMI am quite surprised by the 5 star rating from users (trustpilot) for this site A service that has 23 ratings and all of them 5 stars smells of feedback manipulation and maybe paid reviews. I wouldn't consider that as a plus when determining if this is an exchange I would trust. In fact, those reviews make me not trust it. Many of the reviewers only have that one posted review for ChicksX and no other activity on TrustPilot. Don't trust the reviews you read online.We appreciate your perspective and understand your concerns about the Trustpilot ratings. However, with 7 years of experience in the crypto marketplaces and over 100k completed transactions, we have established a strong track record. You can check our reviews at https://localmonero.co/user/Chicks/feedback?page=9 and review history at https://localbitcoins.net/accounts/profile/PKChicks/ for reference. We encourage you to try our services and form your own opinion. If you have any specific questions or concerns, please let us know. We hope to serve you soon!

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: ChicksX on June 16, 2023, 08:21:25 PMWe appreciate your perspective and understand your concerns about the Trustpilot ratings. However, with 7 years of experience in the crypto marketplaces and over 100k completed transactions, we have established a strong track record. You can check our reviews at https://localmonero.co/user/Chicks/feedback?page=9 and review history at https://localbitcoins.net/accounts/profile/PKChicks/ for reference. Fair enough. I just did. It's true that you have completed thousands of trades on both LocalMonero and LocalBitcoins, but it's not close to 100k. Not on those two platforms at least based on the trading history. 2652 on LocalMonero and 5000+ on LocalBitcoins. Your profiles are also not 7 years old, they are 5 years old. I guess you racked up those numbers elsewhere. Still, that's an impressive trading history and another reason why fake feedback isn't needed.

comments.author: ChicksX
comments.body: Hey Pmalek! Thank you for your response. We genuinely appreciate your feedback and for checking our profiles. Our comment encompasses the overall experience we have acquired from various platforms and our trading networks over the years.We also share your belief that fake feedback serves no purpose. Transparency and integrity are core values for us. Thanks again for your engagement, and if you have any further questions, please let us know!

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: ChicksX on August 20, 2023, 06:00:21 PMOnline @ chicksx.comYour activity is too low in the forum. You should increase your activity in the forum to get more visitors and it will be better if you can hire a campaign manager and run a signature campaign which will be a part of increasing business you and/or profit of you.
